image_resize_height.description: Target height to resize the input image before block analysis. Width is scaled proportionally.

num_blocks_horizontal.description: Number of horizontal divisions to split the image into for diagnostics.

num_blocks_vertical.description: Number of vertical divisions to split the image into for diagnostics.

blockage_region_warn_threshold.description: Number of blocked blocks above which a warning is issued.

blockage_region_error_threshold.description: Number of blocked blocks above which an error is issued.

blockage_ratio_threshold.description: Ratio of dark pixels in a block above which it is considered blocked.

blockage_intensity_threshold.description: Pixel intensity threshold for binarizing the image when detecting blockage.

blockage_frequency_ratio_threshold.description: Average frequency magnitude below which a block is considered blocked due to lack of detail.

shadow_region_warn_threshold.description: Number of shadowed (dark) blocks above which a warning is issued.

shadow_region_error_threshold.description: Number of shadowed (dark) blocks above which an error is issued.

shadow_intensity_threshold.description: Pixel intensity below which a block is considered dark or shadowed.

highlight_region_warn_threshold.description: Number of highlighted (overexposed) blocks above which a warning is issued.

highlight_region_error_threshold.description: Number of highlighted (overexposed) blocks above which an error is issued.

highlight_intensity_threshold.description: Pixel intensity above which a block is considered overexposed (backlight).

low_visibility_region_warn_threshold.description: Number of low visibility (blurred or foggy) blocks above which a warning is issued.

low_visibility_region_error_threshold.description: Number of low visibility (blurred or foggy) blocks above which an error is issued.

low_visibility_frequency_threshold.description: Average frequency magnitude below which a block is considered low visibility (blurry or foggy).
